description: Give Your New iPod a Jolt Nothing but Love for Neon Turn up the volume on style. Each fluorescent flavor is finished off with high-shine gloss, in a TPU material that is flexible and easy to grip. Grip Series: Protection You'll Want to Hold Onto The Grip Neon Glo is super durable, yet thin enough to slip easily into your pocket or bag without adding bulk.
title: Belkin Flex Case for Apple iPod Touch 5th Generation, 2-Pack (Hazard / Blue)
